description:
The thing I notice immediately about Doyle is his amazing smile. It is the kind of smile that lights up his whole face. Its starts small, then just spreads to his eyes. Love it when he smiles or you make him smile.
Despite his two-ton coloring (gotta love construction workers) he is just a super adorable twink. Though if you like your twinks to be bottom-boy submissive, you will be surprised that he prefers to top and be in charge. That's not to say he won't bottom, but topping is what he likes best.
Doyle seems like a shy guy, who opens up slowly. He really listens to what people say, and my guess is, not only would he make a great boyfriend, but just a great friend in general.
Like his demeanor, his solo is quiet, but clearly the boy is turned on and enjoying playing and showing off his cock.
I think I will actually put him with Solomon for an oral video. Just to see if he truly is bossy. Solomon, who loves to be bossed around, might be a little intimidating for such a shy guy, but perhaps he will like the challenge!
title: Doyle - Solo
